thread.section_title: Mantel Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Mantel | www.mantel.com | 29 van 816
thread.title: Jonathan

author: Jonathan
title: Jonathan
text:
Best price for bike I had found. As someone else mentioned in another review, I too was a little wary of ordering a bike from here in the UK, especially as I had never come across Mantel before. The despatch was quick and I was kept up to date with regular emails. Arrived By UPS on day promised, and was east to track on UPS website.
Brakes, gearing etc were all setup very well by Mantel, and needed no adjustment from myself.
There was a little chip on one of the chain stays in a rather inconspicuous position, it that may have come from knocking against the freewheel in transit. It was bubblewrapped, but maybe needed a little more.
